snippet.title: Reveal Trailer Video| Dragonheir Official
snippet.description:
Greetings, Traveler! Come and defeat dragon bosses with your teammates in the marvellous adventures! In Dragonheir: Silent Gods, there is not only romantic magic, but also cold and relentless Dice 20. This is a multiplayer and party-based RPG which will be released on multiple platforms soon.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Subscribe NOW to   @dragonheirsilentgods    to receive the latest game updates
Join Dragonheir: Silent Gods, the open-world high-fantasy strategy RPG, and start your adventure now with your heroic team!
✨Download Dragonheir Now: https://bit.ly/dragonheir-downloadnow

Follow us for the latest news👇
